collection:
## Data Collection

**Type of Data Collected:** We collect only the necessary data to provide our
service.

This includes messages you send to the chatbot on WhatsApp and
interactions on Twitter.

**Purpose of Collection:** Data is used solely to respond to your queries and
improve the service.

**Consent:** By using our chatbot, you consent to the data collection as
outlined in this policy.
sharing:
## Data Sharing and Transfer

**No Selling of Data:** We do not sell your data.

**Third-Party Sharing:** Data is not shared with third parties except as
necessary to provide the service (e.g., integration with WhatsApp and
Twitter).
